pr_title: ArC - normalize @Named qualifier when the name is defaulted

timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Reference Implementation. Welcome to Jakarta EE :)
replies.author: gsmet

timeline.message:
ArC - normalize @Named qualifier when the name is defaulted

- this is not explicitly required by the spec but better align with the
RI behavior
